Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive/Regalia Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Nagaritha Drive and Regalia Way.
Room.LongDescription: Regalia Way, not to be confused with Regalia Drive, is a small connector road, which cuts through the Regalia Convent towards the Allisk Circle. Regalia Way is not a very popular road, but it is a short cut out of the corn and wheat fields in the southern section of town. The large corn fields are located on the southern side of the road, protected by a mesh wire fence.
